resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

fields.summary: [C++] Arrow does not compile on Power9

comments.body: As discussed on https://github.com/Cyan4973/xxHash/pull/426, altivec.h leaks some defines including {{bool}} when compiling with gcc
